sector-7-slums.title: Sector 7 Slums
sector-7-slums.content: A dense sprawl of neon-lit alleys and vertical housing. Home to hackers, hustlers, and those the corporations forgot.
sector-7-slums.lore: A dense sprawl of neon-lit alleys and vertical housing. Home to hackers, hustlers, and those the corporations forgot.

glitch.title: Glitch
glitch.content:
A legendary netrunner with a cybernetic eye and a vendetta against Arasaka. They can bypass almost any ICE.

Currently planning [[The Arasaka Data Heist]].
glitch.lore:
A legendary netrunner with a cybernetic eye and a vendetta against Arasaka. They can bypass almost any ICE.

Currently planning [[The Arasaka Data Heist]].

chrome-eyes.title: Chrome-Eyes
chrome-eyes.content: A back-alley street doc who specializes in high-end cybernetics. He knows the medical history of every runner in the slums.
chrome-eyes.lore: A back-alley street doc who specializes in high-end cybernetics. He knows the medical history of every runner in the slums.

net-ghosts.title: The Net-Ghosts
net-ghosts.content: A global collective of netrunners fighting for data sovereignty and corporate transparency.
net-ghosts.lore: A global collective of netrunners fighting for data sovereignty and corporate transparency.

cyber-hound.title: K9-Cyber Hound
cyber-hound.content: A high-speed mechanical predator equipped with scent-tracking sensors and shock-jaws.
cyber-hound.lore: A high-speed mechanical predator equipped with scent-tracking sensors and shock-jaws.

cyberdeck-blueprint.title: Blueprint: Mark IV Cyberdeck
cyberdeck-blueprint.content: Detailed schematics for a custom netrunning rig featuring multi-core processing and specialized ICE-breakers.
cyberdeck-blueprint.lore: Detailed schematics for a custom netrunning rig featuring multi-core processing and specialized ICE-breakers.

the-arasaka-data-heist.title: The Arasaka Data Heist
the-arasaka-data-heist.content: A high-risk operation to infiltrate the Arasaka mainframe and steal classified neural mapping data.
the-arasaka-data-heist.lore: A high-risk operation to infiltrate the Arasaka mainframe and steal classified neural mapping data.
